name: @mentra/display-utils
description: Glasses-agnostic, pixel-accurate text measurement and wrapping library for smart glasses displays

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --sourcemap=external
scripts.dev: echo 'No build needed in dev mode - using source files directly'
